name: WIKIMUSICAL @ New York Musical Theatre Festival (NYMF) 2014!
blurb: Help us make the journey through cyberspace in this new musical! An Official Selection of the 2014 New York Musical Theatre Festival.

name: Moonlet Theater presents "The Last Five Years"
blurb: I am thrilled to announce my theater company's first production! "The Last Five Years"- J. Robert Brown. Starring myself and JP Jones.

name: Andina, the Opera That Never Was
blurb: What would you do if you discovered your great grandfather's long-lost opera? Help us resurrect "Andina" for the world to finally see!

name: My Beautiful Black Dog
blurb: Gig meets theatre meets a tidal wave of glitter. A poetically joyous musical exploring the beautiful complexity of mental health.

name: 'What's Your Wish?'- Thicket & Thistle's FringeNYC Musical
blurb: Help send our show to FringeNYC!  A story of two best friends and their escape from the treacherous storybook world of Death Forest.

name: Sweet Emmaline: The Musical Journey of Debbie McDade
blurb: The project is a live stage production, a tribute to St. Augustine’s own jazz singer, Debbie McDade, featuring Mama Blue.

name: EUROBEAT
blurb: EUROBEAT - a whole new hilarious musical contest with 10 countries all desperate to become the winners of this year's competition!

name: OperaBend's Vía Láctea: A Woman Walks the Camino de Santiago
blurb: As she walks the Camino, a woman of a certain age poses questions about her life and is answered by an unlikely cast of characters.

name: With Great Power: An Original Superhero Musical
blurb: A high school student-written original musical about a team of retired middle-aged superheroes called back in action one last time.

name: Sex Workers' Opera - Bigger, Braver & Badder.
blurb: A show created & performed by Sex Workers & Friends locally & globally, breaking stigma & stereotypes through theatre, dance & song.

name: How to Give Birth to a Rabbit
blurb: “HOW TO GIVE BIRTH TO A RABBIT” is a collection of songs and musical compositions performed at this July's Capital Fringe Festival.

name: Kat Robichaud's Misfit Cabaret
blurb: Be a part of bringing to life a unique theatrical experience at the Historic Great Star Theater in the heart of San Francisco.

name: Bringing West Side Story to Jakarta, Indonesia
blurb: In a city laden with prejudice & discrimination, we are speaking out against the plight through the powerful language of music theater.

name: World Premiere of Weed Shop the Musical
blurb: Weed Shop is a brand-new musical comedy by Becca Grumet & Madelyne Heyman, opening Oct. 28 at the Eclectic Company Theatre!

name: Song of Solomon - A New Musical - Concept Album
blurb: We're recording an album for the new musical, Song of Solomon, starring Broadway vets Ramin Karimloo, Alison Luff, Alexander Gemignani!

name: #StoptheStigma - Help us bring mental health center stage!
blurb: What does it look like to live with mental illness? Join this family's journey in the contemporary musical about life, love and coping.

name: The Fires of Nero: Rise of a Dictator (A Play with Song)
blurb: Emperor Nero of Rome goes to any length to get what he desires. No one will stand in his way! Help bring a world premiere to Chicago!

name: Alien Vs. Musical's Off-Broadway Debut!
blurb: The award-winning Alien Vs. Musical finally makes it to the Big Apple with its OFF-BROADWAY DEBUT in January 2019!

name: The Feste Project
blurb: A cabaret play and not-too-faithful remix of Shakespeare and 90's queer club culture.

name: 'BARE' a Pop Opera in the Church
blurb: This march, we're bringing the electric pop opera 'BARE' to St. John's Lutheran in NYC. Step into the lives of these young teens...

name: Passion Project: Love Songs from Women to their Work
blurb: PASSION PROJECT is a song cycle where 12 brilliant women from history sing to their great loves: the object of their careers.

name: Spectra Theatre Co. Kickstarter 2019-2020
blurb: Spectra Theatre Co. believes that storytellers of all spectrums should be embraced. This season marks the first step forward.

name: Busy Being Ze!
blurb: An LGBTQ+ puppet show for children and families called, 'Busy Being Ze,'which is about fitting in, growing up and standing out! LGBT

name: I Have Graven Thee
blurb: A Christ-Centered Musical Production

name: Snowflakes in SoCal! A High School Musical
blurb: about loving the real world: the one we've got (the one that's getting hot). Designed for High Schoolers: debuted by us.

name: AURIC (Songs from a Golden Age) THE ALBUM
blurb: A gig theatre show that combines experimental music with Spanish Golden Age poetry made into an album.

name: My Geriatric Uterus: The Digital Experience
blurb: A Solo Puppet Musical for Our Times

name: Medusa The Legend
blurb: Medusa the musical. You will be a part of reveloutionising the musical theatre world!

name: This Could Be On Broadway!
blurb: A new stage musical exploring the emotional turbulence & existential reckoning of high school students mounting their spring musical.

name: Welcome to Marfa - A New Musical
blurb: A new musical set in the artsy town of Marfa, Texas!

name: Staten Island! The Musical
blurb: An original musical comedy about life in the fifth borough.

name: In The House the Musical
blurb: A Love Letter to Lin Manuel Miranda

name: Xena: Warrior Musical Live Recording & New Cast Album
blurb: Professional filming of the new rock musical running September 2022 in Brooklyn NY + Signed Original Cast Album.

name: Help fund ACORN's inaugural season of inclusive theatre!
blurb: Indiana's new inclusive community theater company ACORN (All Colors Of the Rainbow are Necessary) wants to produce 4 shows this year!

name: Briar/Rose: a Queer Fairytale Musical
blurb: A heartfelt tale of identity, choice, and belonging - performed live in Seattle, recorded for an international audience.

name: The Assembly's New Musical IN CORPO - The World Premiere!
blurb: Nate Weida & Ben Beckley's electro-pop/folk/funk musical draw freely from works by Kafka & Melville to tell a chillingly familiar story
